# Interactive component

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(parcoords)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Load Data
master_df <- read.csv(file = "data/master.csv")

interactive_df <- master_df %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  select(c("year", "solar", "biofuel", "wind", "coal", 
           "nuclear", "other_renew", "gas", "oil", "hydro")) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise_all(list(sum)) %>%
  rename(Year="year", Solar="solar", Biofuel="biofuel", Wind="wind",
         Coal="coal", Nuclear="nuclear", 
         "Other renewables"="other_renew", Gas="gas", Oil="oil",
          Hydropower="hydro")

write.csv(interactive_df,"data/interactive.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
